text: Young Guns of Texas is a 1962 American western movie. It was directed by Maury Dexter. Actors include James Mitchum, Alana Ladd, Jody McCrea, Gary Conway, and Chill Wills. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1962 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Maury Dexter Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Young Guns of Texas
